USER.comment: username used by script to ssh to proxmox host

HOST.comment: ip-address of proxmox host used by script to ssh to host

ID.comment: Proxmox ID to assign the new template

CORES.comment: Memory assigned to the template in MB

MEMORY.comment: Memory assigned to the template in MB

STORAGE_CONTROLLER.comment: the storage controller selected for the VM template

LOCAL_STORAGE.comment: the filesystem to use for the VM template

NETWORK_CONTROLLER.comment: the network controller selected for the VM template

NETWORK_BRIDGE.comment: the network bridge to use for the VM template

DISKIMAGE.comment: the diskimage used to create the disk for the VM template
